basics.name: Cooper Bell
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Fullstack Software Engineer with experience in DevOps, web applications and services.  I'm fluent in several languages, but tend to prefer functional ones.  I love all facets of software engineering, especially the more theoretical aspects of it (including the adjacent subjects of mathematics and physics).

work.name: Carl Zeiss Digital Innovations
work.summary: Veracity is a cataract surgery planning solution and integrates with various EMRs and medical devices.  Worked across the entire stack of the application, from device integrations inside the clinic, AWS DevOps, server-side programming in Node.js to frontend development in React.js.

work.name: McLane Corporation
work.summary: Develop and maintain multiple web applications and web services, mainly written in various Java frameworks (Vaadin, JSF and Struts mostly).  Use the Atlassian suite of products for CI, issues and wiki documentation (Bamboo, Jira, Confluence and Bitbucket).  Participate in on-call rotation every 5-6 weeks for production issues relating to applications.  Earned yearly bonuses for developing applications outside of regular assignments.

education.institution: University of Texas of the Permian Basin
